Which of the following descriptions is a characteristic of the work shown that identifies it as a panel painted by Giotto di Bondone in the Arena (Scrovegni) Chapel?

choices.label: Staged composition with theatrical gestures to draw the viewer into the scene
Inlaid precious and semiprecious stones to display the wealth and status of the patron
Use of cobalt pigments acquired through trade to create the lustrous blue background
Influence of Classical statuary on the figures' poses and garments to reflect an interest in humanism
